This project is a DevOps demonstration platform for a Junior DevOps Engineer portfolio. It includes:
- Python microservice
- MongoDB, MySQL, Redis, RabbitMQ
- Nginx Ingress (custom Helm chart)
- GitLab CI/CD
- Prometheus, Thanos, ELK stack
- Istio, Terraform
- Bash/Python scripts
- Azure example configs

Focus on infrastructure-as-code, automation, monitoring, and best DevOps practices.
